detectors.description:

	But does not have a function to withdraw the ether

detectors.description:

	- StandardToken.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#74-76)
	- Token.balanceOf(address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#33)

transfer(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#52-60)
	- Token.transfer(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#35)

approve(address,uint256) should be declared external:
	- StandardToken.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#78-83)
	- Token.approve(address,uint256) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#39)

allowance(address,address) should be declared external:
	- Token.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#41)
	- StandardToken.allowance(address,address) (tests_etherscan/dataset_etherscan/MRAToken.sol#85-87)

fallback() should be declared external:
